# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a localization value instance.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ value: String)
```

## Parameters

- **value**: A string that provides the localization key to look up. This parameter also serves as the default value if the system canâ€™t find a localized string.

## Discussion

Creating a [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Swift/String/LocalizationValue] with this initializer creates a localized value with no interpolated values.
